name: Nightboarder
description:
You find yourself in the engine room of an old rust bucket of a starship. The air is thick with tension, you're deep behind enemy lines. To get home you have to take control of this ship, fight your way against impossible odds. Fix this broken hunk of junk and warp to safety!

Controls are:

E = interact

R = shoot/quit menus

G = interact with special systems

Arrows = move

Esc = Controller menu while in game

(Xbox Controller supported)

Credits

Game Art and Programming by Ruben Tipparach

Sounds

"512 Retro Sounds Pack" by  Juhani Junkala (SubspaceAudio)  - opengameart.org

Music

"Fourth Movement" by Christovix Games - opengameart.org

"Night Chip" by Joshua McLean  - opengameart.org

This game was made in 10 days for the Retrograde Jam https://itch.io/jam/retrograde-jam
